name: BoxTrot
description:
BE SURE TO ZOOM OUT!

Adventure through levels of dungeons to find hind gems! With the help of other boxes, you can throw yourself up onto platforms and find the gem at the end of the level. Be sure to watch out as each level is filled with danger!

Controls:
  • Use the arrow keys or WASD to move. 
  • Aim by press the E key then throw yourself with mouse 1
